text: Bruno Ferreira dos Santos (born 14 September 1994), known as Bruno Ferreira or simply Bruno, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Aimoré as a right back. ==Career== Born in São Paulo, Bruno graduated from Portuguesa's youth system. On 28 October 2014 he made his professional debut, starting in a 0–3 away loss against Oeste, with his side being relegated to Série C for the first time ever.Oeste bate Lusa, sai da zona da degola e rebaixa rival para a Série C (Oeste defeats Lusa, leaves the relegation places and relegates opponent to Série C); Globo Esporte, 28 October 2014 On 8 November, again as a starter, Bruno provided the assist for Luan's only goal in a 1–0 home success over Luverdense.Após 14 jogos, rebaixada Portuguesa bate o Luverdense e volta a vencer (After 14 games, relegated Portuguesa defeats Luverdense and returns to win); Globo Esporte, 8 November 2014 Late in the month he scored his first professional goal, netting the first of a 2–3 home loss against Vila Nova.Despedida: em duelo de rebaixados, Vila derrota Portuguesa no Canindé (Farewell: in relegated clash, Vila defeats Portuguesa in Canindé); Globo Esporte, 28 November 2014 On 23 December Bruno moved to Vasco da Gama, newly promoted to Série A.Vice da Lusa confirma saída de Bruno Ferreira e critica empresário: “Não pisa mais no Canindé” (Lusa's vice confirms Bruno Ferreira's exit and criticizes entrepreneur "He does not step into Canindé anymore"); LusaNews, 23 December 2014 On 6 February 2015, he was loaned to Bragantino until May.Vasco acerta o empréstimo de Bruno Ferreira e Erick Luis para o Bragantino (Vasco completes the loan of Bruno Ferreira and Erick Luis to Bragantino);
